verses.name: Mark 12:9
verses.text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do? he will come and destroy the husbandmen, and will give the vineyard unto others.

verses.name: Mark 12:10
verses.text: And have ye not read this scripture; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner:

verses.name: Mark 12:11
verses.text: This was the Lord’s doing, and it is marvellous in our eyes?

verses.name: Mark 12:12
verses.text: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
